isApprovedForAll(address,address).details: Query if an address is an authorized operator for another address.

params.operator_: The address that acts on behalf of the owner.
params.owner_: The address that owns the records.

returns._0: True if `operator_` is an approved operator for `owner_`, false otherwise.

owner(bytes32).details: Returns the address that owns the specified node.

recordExists(bytes32).details: Returns whether a record has been imported to the registry.

resolver(bytes32).details: Returns the address of the resolver for the specified node.

setApprovalForAll(address,bool).details: Enable or disable approval for a third party ("operator") to manage  all of `msg.sender`'s BNS records. Emits the ApprovalForAll event.

params.approved_: True if the operator is approved, false to revoke approval.
params.operator_: Address to add to the set of authorized operators.

setOwner(bytes32,address).details: Transfers ownership of a node to a new address. May only be called by the current owner of the node.

params.node_: The node to transfer ownership of.
params.owner_: The address of the new owner.

setRecord(bytes32,address,address,uint64.details: Sets the record for a node.

params.owner_: The address of the new owner.

setResolver(bytes32,address).details: Sets the resolver address for the specified node.

setSubnodeOwner(bytes32,bytes32,address).details: Transfers ownership of a subnode keccak256(node, label) to a new address. May only be called by the owner of the parent node.

params.label_: The hash of the label specifying the subnode.
params.owner_: The address of the new owner.

setSubnodeRecord(bytes32,bytes32,address.details: Sets the record for a subnode.

params.label_: The hash of the label specifying the subnode.
params.owner_: The address of the new owner.

setTTL(bytes32,uint64).details: Sets the TTL for the specified node.

ttl(bytes32).details: Returns the TTL of a node, and any records associated with it.
